body: NOOOOOOOO, i cant believe how long it took for part 4 to drop for it all to be a dream? Nah, maybe they just erase his memories. In the prequel the succubus girl is watching the guy from magic orb in his room
Good shit! Hope it gets translated
Damn this guy cannot catch a break...or maybe he did...I can't read the ending, but even if it was all just dreams, that's pretty sad in itself since he had finally found someone he loved...
